mapper.sql: EEF121, AEF101, AEF104, AEF132, AEF133, AAE011, AAE036, AAF011, AAE009, AAE010, AAE200, AAE199, AAE202, AAE201, AAE198, AAE203, AAE133, AAE134, AAE132, AAE135, AAE102, AAE013, AAB301, EAE052
mapper.select: select a.EEF121, a.AEF101, a.AEF104, a.AEF132, a.AEF133, a.AAE011,a.AAE036, a.AAB301, a.EAE052 from EF12 a, EE18 b where a.aef101=b.aef101 and a.aef101 = #{aef101,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.aef132='3' and a.aef133='1' and a.eae052='1' and b.aee150=#{aee150,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from EF12 where AEF101 = #{aef101,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and aef132=3 and aae036 in (select max(c.aae036) from ef12 c )

select
from EF12 where AAB998 = #{aab998,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and AEF132='3' and aae036 in (select max(c.aae036) from ef12 c where c.aef132='3' and c.aef133='1' group by c.aef101)

select a.EEF121,b.AEF101, b.AEF104, a.AEF132, b.AEF133,b.AAE132,b.AAE135, b.AAE102, b.AAE013, b.AAB301, b.EAE052 from EF12 a,ef11 b where b.AAB998 = #{aab998,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and AEF132='4' and a.aef101=b.aef101

select a.EEF121,b.AEF101, b.AEF104, a.AEF132, b.AEF133,b.AAE132,b.AAE135, b.AAE102, b.AAE013, b.AAB301, b.EAE052 from EF12 a,ef11 b where b.AAB998 = #{aab998,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and AEF132='2' and a.aef101=b.aef101
